troparion: (Tone 4) You know of what we are made, O Lord; * You know our weakness, O our God. * Although we have sinned, we have not renounced You. * We have not stretched out our hand to a strange god. * O God of mercy, in Your goodness, spare us.
prokimenon: I will praise You, Lord, with all my heart;
I will recount all Your wonders.
I will rejoice in You and be glad, and sing psalms to your name, O Most High.
second_prokimenon: and loves justice; * the upright shall see His face.
In the Lord I have taken my refuge.
